field.label: Description
field.help: Set an optional description for this neighbor.

field.label: Peer-IP
field.help: Specify the IP of your neighbor.

field.label: Remote AS
field.help: Neighbor AS.

field.label: BGP MD5 Password
field.help: Set a password for BGP authentication.

field.label: Weight
field.help: Specify a default weight value for the neighborâ€™s routes.

field.label: Local Initiater IP
field.help: Set the local IP connecting to the neighbor. This is only required for BGP authentication.

field.label: Update-Source Interface
field.help: Physical name of the IPv4 interface facing the peer. Please refer to the FRR documentation for more information.

field.label: IPv6 link-local interface
field.help: Interface to use for IPv6 link-local neighbours. Please refer to the FRR documentation for more information.

field.label: Next-Hop-Self All
field.help: Add the parameter "all" after next-hop-self command.

field.label: Multi-Hop
field.help: Specifying ebgp-multihop allows sessions with eBGP neighbors to establish when they are multiple hops away. When the neighbor is not directly connected and this knob is not enabled, the session will not establish.

field.label: Multi-Protocol
field.help: Is this neighbour multiprotocol capable per RFC 2283

field.label: BFD
field.help: You can enable BFD support for this neighbor.

field.label: Keepalive
field.help: Keepalive timer to check if the neighbor is still up. Default when unset is 60 seconds.

field.label: Hold Down Time
field.help: The time in seconds when a neighbor is considered dead. This is usually 3 times the keeplive timer and when unset 180 seconds.

field.label: Connect Timer
field.help: The time in seconds how fast a neighbor tries to reconnect.

field.label: Enable AS-Override
field.help: Override AS number of the originating router with the local AS number. This command is only allowed for eBGP peers.

field.label: Disable Connected Check
field.help: Allow peerings between directly connected eBGP peers using loopback addresses.

field.label: Prefix-List In
field.help: Prefix-List for inbound direction

field.label: Prefix-List Out
field.help: Prefix-List for outbound direction

field.label: Route-Map In
field.help: Route-Map for inbound direction

field.label: Route-Map Out
field.help: Route-Map for outbound direction
